title: Field Safety Corrective Action — Delivery Catheter Tip Advisory
description: Advisory notice to healthcare professionals regarding potential catheter tip deformation in highly tortuous coronary anatomy. No device recall; advisory to use alternative access routes or pre-dilation in cases of extreme tortuosity.
root_cause: Catheter tip deformation under extreme bending stress in tortuous vessels (>3 sequential bends >90°)
corrective_action: Physician advisory letter distributed; IFU supplement issued with updated navigation guidance for tortuous anatomy; enhanced pre-market testing protocol for future lots
